A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The biggest disappointment and let down. The movie was so disconnected and didnt flow at all. It was confusing and made little sense. I feel like they put forth little to no effort in making this movie. They ruined lukes character\, poe and general hux were the complete opposite of how they were in TFA. Snoke was possibly the biggest let down of the whole movie. So many plot holes and unanswered questions. The special effects were crap in parts of the movie. Yoda was garbage. A long awaited movie and a huge let down. The critics may have loved it (not sure why)\, but its clear that the fans are hating it. Just look at the audience score. Attack of the clones was a better movie. Thanks disney...you actually managed to ruin star wars. Please bring back J. J. Abrams.
